content: remove marker  wyib with yarn held in the back  wyif with yarn held in the front  ai2k as if to knit  ai2p as if to purl faux-cable stitch pattern / / 16 rnd1 p1 k6 p1 repeat / δ / 15 rnd2 p1 k6 p1 repeat / / 14 rnd3 p1 m1r k2 ssk k2 p1 repeat / δ / 13 rnd4 p1 k6 p1 repeat / / 12 rnd5 p1 k1 m1r k2 ssk k1 p1 repeat / δ / 11 rnd6 p1 k6 p1 repeat / / 10 rnd7 p1 k2 m1r k2 ssk p1 repeat / / 9 rnd8 p1 k6 p1 repeat / / 8 rnd9 p1 k6 p1 repeat / σ λ / 7 rnd10 p1 k6 p1 repeat / / 6 / σ λ / 5 rnd11 p1 k2 k2tog k2 m1l p1 repeat / / 4 rnd12 p1 k6 p1 repeat / σ λ / 3 rnd13 p1 k1 k2tog k2 m1l k1 p1 repeat / / 2 rnd14 p1 k6 p1 repeat / / 1 rnd15 p1 k2tog k2 m1l k2 p1 repeat 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 rnd16 p1 k6 p1 repeat directions toe using magic cast-on cast on 20 stitches total 10 on each needle round 1 k to end of round round 2 circ 1 * k2 m1l k to within 2 stitches of end of needle 1 m1r k2 circ 2 repeat from * repeat rnd1 and round 2 until there are 64 stitches total 32 on each needle foot all rounds circ 1 work next row from faux-cable stitch pattern circ 2 p1 k until 1 stitch remains on left needle p1 repeat this round until the faux-cable stitch pattern has been repeated 3 times work 10 more rounds ending on row 10 of the faux-cable stitch pattern © 2007 judy becker / last update 12/20/2021 http //www persistentillusion com gusset round 1 circ 1 work next row from faux-cable stitch pattern circ 2 p1 m1l k until one stitch remains on left needle m1r p1 round 2 circ 1 work next row from faux-cable stitch pattern circ 2 p1 k until one stitch remains on left needle p1 repeat these two rounds 12 times 56 stitches on circ 2 ending on row 1 of faux-cable stitch pattern last round circ 1 work row 2 of faux-cable stitch pattern circ 2 work heel turn and heel flap heel turn note if knitting two socks together complete the turn and heel flap of one sock before starting the turn and heel flap of the second sock row 1 p1 k19 pm m1r k16 m1l pm turn 18 stitches between markers 20 stitches to each side row 2 sl 1 st wyif ai2p p15 turn row 3 m1r k14 m1l turn 20 stitches between markers row 4 sl 1 st wyif ai2p p13 turn row 5 m1r k12 m1l turn 22 stitches between markers row 6 sl 1 st wyif ai2p p11
